title: Number of eSports games players worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
The Number of players in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
There is a difference of 97.6 between the maximum Sport League of Legends and minimum Sport StarCraft II.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
Sport League of Legends has the highest Number of players in millions and StarCraft II has the lowest Number of players in millions.
The difference of Number of players in millions between the highest and lowest Sport is 97.6.
The Sport League of Legends has the highest Number of players in millions, followed by Call of Duty, and Hearthstone. Down to the Sport StarCraft II which is the lowest.
Sport World of Tanks, and FIFA 17 have a similar Number of players in millions that is 12.3.
The lowest value 2.4 at StarCraft II is almost 4.28 times smaller than the average value 23.37.
